refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Converts a complex-valued input array into a real-valued array, by removing its imaginary part. The output array will be halt the size of the input. This is a utility operation to facilitate complex-valued operations where the result is purely real.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the real-valued output. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the complex-valued real-imaginary input.
